string.discord.command.lockchannel.success.embe: The channel, **${channel}**, has been kicked from **${guild}** for **${reason}**
string.discord.command.lockchannel.error.unspec: The channel that you provided was invalid! Please specify a valid channel/ID.
string.discord.command.lockchannel.error.proble: An error occurred when using this command.
string.discord.command.lockchannel.error.rateli: You're currently on cooldown! You have **${seconds}** left before you can use another command.
string.discord.command.lockchannel.error.alread: That locked has already been locked!
string.discord.command.lockchannel.error.botmis: I am missing the `MANAGE_CHANNELS` permission. Please turn that on so I can lock said channel.
string.discord.command.lockchannel.error.usermi: You are missing the `MANAGE_CHANNELS` permission. Please have the required permission so you can lock said channel.
